title: Vitaliy Hoshkoderya
text:
Vitaliy Hoshkoderya (, born 8 January 1988) is a <a href="professional">professional</a> <a href="Ukraine">Ukrainian</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a>.
He is a son of <a href="Valeriy%20Hoshkoderya">Valeriy Hoshkoderya</a>.
Career.
He was born in <a href="Donetsk">Donetsk</a>, <a href="Ukrainian%20SSR">Ukrainian SSR</a>, and is a product of <a href="FC%20Shakhtar%20Donetsk">FC Shakhtar Donetsk</a> training academy. His father Valeriy Hoshkoderya is a retired <a href="Shakhtar%20Donetsk">Shakhtar Donetsk</a> player.
He was loaned to <a href="Volyn%20Lutsk">Volyn Lutsk</a> in the <a href="Ukrainian%20Premier%20League">Ukrainian Premier League</a> from 30 August 2010.
